00149    /* 
00150    * Inline method: get the preferential angle and effective spring constant for
00151    * given l_20
00152    */
00153    void CfbRebridgeBase::getAngKappaNorm(double l_20, double &prefAng,
00154            double &kappa, double &normConst)
00155    {
00156       if (l_20 <= l20Table[0]) {
00157          prefAng   = angTable[0];
00158          kappa     = kappaTable[0];
00159          normConst = normalTable[0];
00160       } else if (l_20 >= l20Table[MaxBin_-1]) {
00161          prefAng   = angTable[MaxBin_-1];
00162          kappa     = kappaTable[MaxBin_-1];
00163          normConst = normalTable[MaxBin_-1];
00164       } else {
00165          int i;
00166          i = int ( (l_20 - l20Table[0]) / (l20Table[2] - l20Table[1]) );
00167          prefAng   = angTable[i+1];
00168          kappa     = kappaTable[i+1];
00169          normConst = normalTable[i+1];
00170       }
00171    }
00172    
00173    /* 
00174    * Inline method: compute the actual angle and the Boltzmann weight.
00175    */
00176    void CfbRebridgeBase::orientationBias(
00177       Vector u_21, Vector u_20, double prefAng, double kappaAng, double &bias)
00178    {
00179       double actualAng;
00180    
00181       actualAng = acos(u_21.dot(u_20));
00182       bias = boltzmann(0.5*kappaAng*(actualAng - prefAng)*(actualAng - prefAng));
00183    }
00184    
00185 }
